description.ko: 유기적 식물학과 컴퓨터 구조의 융합으로, 디지털 자연의 모습으로 메인보드를 되찾는 프랙탈 꽃을 묘사합니다.
description.en: A fusion of organic botany and computer architecture, depicting a fractal flower reclaiming a motherboard in a display of digital nature.

prompt: An intricate digital orchid blooming from a circuit-etched #4A0E4E obsidian plate. Its petals are composed of shifting #89CFF0 iridescent fractal code and translucent glass veins pulsing with #FFB6C1 light. #50C878 mossy circuitry grows along the stem, releasing binary-coded pollen that glows in a soft bokeh background. Macro photography style, Octane Render, 8k, nature reclaiming technology in an eternal digital spring.
